about.details:
Incorporated in 2004, Kataria Industries Limited manufactures and supplies Low Relaxation Pre-stressed Concrete (LRPC) Strands and Steel Wires, Post-tensioning (PT) Anchorage System (Anchor Cone, Anchor Head, and Wedges), HDPE Single-Wall Corrugated (SWC) Sheathing Ducts, Couplers, and Aluminum Conductors. The company's wide range of products is used in various sectors, including Infrastructure, Roads, Bridges, Flyovers, Metros, Railways, High-Rise Buildings, Atomic Reactors, LNG Tanks, Power Transmission, and Distribution Lines.

The product portfolio of the company comprises the following:-

  • LRPC Strands
  • Polymer-coated grease/wax-filled LRPC Strands
  • Galvanised LRPC Strands
  • Galvanised PE Coated LRPC Strands
  • Specialised LRPC Strands (19 Strands and Upto 23.00 mm)

The company has two manufacturing plants in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, both equipped with essential machinery, infrastructure, and in-house testing facilities to ensure our products meet standards.

The company's manufacturing facility is certified for quality management systems under ISO 9001:2015.

The company serves both domestic and international customers and has exported goods to Dubai, Qatar, Nepal, Iran, Oman, Bahrain, and Brazil.

As of December 31, 2023, the company employs 71 permanent workers in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Kataria Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kataria Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 5685000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹54.58 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹96 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on July 16, 2024, and closes on July 19, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kataria Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kataria Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kataria Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kataria Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kataria Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kataria Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kataria Industries IPO opens on July 16, 2024 and closes on July 19, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kataria Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Kataria Industries IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,15,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kataria Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kataria Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Kataria Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Kataria Industries IPO will be done on Monday, July 22, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, July 23, 2024. Check the Kataria Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Kataria Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Kataria Industries IPO listing date is on Wednesday, July 24, 2024.
